title: Massive lemon muffins
ingredients: ['For the muffin', '390g self raising flour', '200g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '240ml millk', '120ml oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs, beaten', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'lemon curd, to taste', 'For the topping', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon of cinnamon']
